# üéâ Wishlist App

Welcome to the **Wishlist App**! üåü A simple and elegant solution for managing your dreams and desires. Whether it‚Äôs that new gadget you‚Äôve been eyeing or a book you can‚Äôt wait to read, this app helps you keep track of everything you wish for! üíñ

## üì± Features

- **Neat and Clean UI**: Enjoy a user-friendly interface designed for effortless navigation. üñåÔ∏è
- **Permanent Storage**: Your wishes are securely stored using **Room Database** for easy access anytime! üì¶
- **CRUD Operations**: Create, Read, Update, and Delete wishes with ease. Your wishlist, your rules! üîÑ
- **Optimized Performance**: Experience lightning-fast loading times and smooth interactions. ‚ö°

## üöÄ Getting Started

### Installation Instructions:
1. Download the APK file from the [Releases section](https://github.com/mohitk21103/WishListApp/releases/tag/v1.0.0) üì•.
2. **Allow installations from unknown sources**:
   - Go to your device **Settings** ‚öôÔ∏è.
   - Tap on **Security** or **Privacy** üîí.
   - Enable **Install unknown apps** for the browser or file manager you‚Äôre using.
3. Install the APK and start creating your wishlist! üéà

### Important Note:
Don‚Äôt forget to disable the **unknown sources** option after installation for your security! üîê

## üõ†Ô∏è Technologies Used
- **Android**: Kotlin for a smooth development experience.
- **Room Database**: For reliable data storage.
- **MVVM Architecture**: To keep the code clean and maintainable.
